info.title: Hypixel Public API
info.description:
# Introduction
This is the official Hypixel API documentation. [Hypixel Website](https://hypixel.net/) - [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/HypixelDev/PublicAPI) - [API Help Forum](https://hypixel.net/forums/api-help.111/)

All use of the API must conform to the [API policies](https://developer.hypixel.net/policies), violation of these policies may lead to applications being revoked or users banned from the API.
## Limits
API keys are limited to a maximum amount of requests per 5 minute intervals. These limits will depend on the type of application that the key is assigned to.

Endpoints which require the use of an API key will also respond with headers to assist with managing the rate limit:
- 'RateLimit-Limit' - The limit of requests per minute for the provided API key.
- 'RateLimit-Remaining' - The remaining amount of requests allowed for the current minute.
- 'RateLimit-Reset' - The amount of seconds until the next minute and the reset of the API key usages.

## GameTypes
| ID | Type Name      | Database Name | Clean Name           |
 |----|----------------|---------------|----------------------|
 | 2  | QUAKECRAFT     | Quake         | Quake                |
 | 3  | WALLS          | Walls         | Walls                |
 | 4  | PAINTBALL      | Paintball     | Paintball            |
 | 5  | SURVIVAL_GAMES | HungerGames   | Blitz Survival Games |
 | 6  | TNTGAMES       | TNTGames      | TNT Games            |
 | 7  | VAMPIREZ       | VampireZ      | VampireZ             |
 | 13 | WALLS3         | Walls3        | Mega Walls           |
 | 14 | ARCADE         | Arcade        | Arcade               |
 | 17 | ARENA          | Arena         | Arena                |
 | 20 | UHC            | UHC           | UHC Champions        |
 | 21 | MCGO           | MCGO          | Cops and Crims       |
 | 23 | BATTLEGROUND   | Battleground  | Warlords             |
 | 24 | SUPER_SMASH    | SuperSmash    | Smash Heroes         |
 | 25 | GINGERBREAD    | GingerBread   | Turbo Kart Racers    |
 | 26 | HOUSING        | Housing       | Housing              |
 | 51 | SKYWARS        | SkyWars       | SkyWars              |
 | 52 | TRUE_COMBAT    | TrueCombat    | Crazy Walls          |
 | 54 | SPEED_UHC      | SpeedUHC      | Speed UHC            |
 | 55 | SKYCLASH       | SkyClash      | SkyClash             |
 | 56 | LEGACY         | Legacy        | Classic Games        |
 | 57 | PROTOTYPE      | Prototype     | Prototype            |
 | 58 | BEDWARS        | Bedwars       | Bed Wars             |
 | 59 | MURDER_MYSTERY | MurderMystery | Murder Mystery       |
 | 60 | BUILD_BATTLE   | BuildBattle   | Build Battle         |
 | 61 | DUELS          | Duels         | Duels                |
 | 63 | SKYBLOCK       | SkyBlock      | SkyBlock             |
 | 64 | PIT            | Pit           | Pit                  |
 | 65 | REPLAY         | Replay        | Replay               |
 | 67 | SMP            | SMP           | SMP                  |
 | 68 | WOOL_GAMES     | WoolGames     | Wool Wars            |

### Storage
Games store their respective stats and data in a Player's `stats` collection. The game's specific data is held within a JSON object named after it's `Database Name` (seen above.)
### GameType Notes
* Clean names are what is displayed to the user when referencing the name.
* Database names or IDs are used when the API references a specific GameType.
## Notes

### Date and Time
Generally dates are stored as a Unix Epoch times in milliseconds.
### Response Format
Responses are served in JSON format.
### UUID Parameters
All uuid parameters support both dashed and undashed versions.
### SkyBlock items and inventories
Items and inventory data are stored as a base64 encoded string containing gzipped nbt data.
If a method is missing important information about an item or inventory, you should try checking this!
>Note: the base64 string may contain a unicode escape for non-alphabetical symbols, and some programming languages may have silent defects when interpreting the string. 

# Authentication

<!-- ReDoc-Inject: <security-definitions> -->

ApiKey.name: API-Key
ApiKey.description: Obtained via the [Hypixel Developer Dashboard](https://developer.hypixel.net) when creating an application. You can also request higher limits for production applications in this dashboard.

DataMissing.description: Some data is missing, this is usually a field.

InvalidKey.description: Access is forbidden, usually due to an invalid API key being used.

RateLimited.description: A request limit has been reached, usually this is due to the limit on the key being reached but can also be triggered by a global throttle.

global.description: When this boolean exists and is true, the throttle occurring is a global throttle applied to all users

MissingPage.description: The page provided does not exist.

NotPopulated.description: The data is not yet populated and should be available shortly

cause.example: Leaderboard data has not yet been populated

NoResult.description: The request responded with no result.

items.description: UUID of the player in a dashed format

members.description: A map of member UUIDs to member profiles objects

deletion_notice.description: If this field exists, the member profile is marked as deleted

cute_name.description: The cute name of the profile, only provided on the profiles endpoint

selected.description: Whether or not this is the currently selected profile, only provided on the profiles endpoint

banking.description: Information about the bank account for this profile, only present if the API banking setting is enabled

game_mode.description: The SkyBlock game mode of the profile, not present if normal mode

id.description: The unique identifier for this item

material.description: The Bukkit material enum value for the item

tier.description: The rarity tier of the item

color.description: The color metadata to be applied to an item, usually leather armor pieces

skin.description: The skin value for a skull based item

Game.description: Information about a specific game. When a field is not present you should fallback to the provided default if there is one, required fields will always exist.

id.description: The backend ID of the game.

name.description: The display name of the game.

databaseName.description: The key used for database storage, such as for stats.

modeNames.description: A map of mode key to display name

retired.description: True if the game is retired and no longer playable.

legacy.description: True if the game is legacy and part of the Classic Lobby.

item_id.description: The SkyBlock item ID for this sale

start.description: The start time in unix milliseconds for the sale

end.description: The end time in unix milliseconds for the sale

amount.description: The amount of items available for this sale

price.description: The price in Gems for this sale

SkyBlockGarden.description: Information about a player's SkyBlock garden, the only guaranteed field is the `uuid` field.

uuid.description: The UUID of the profile for this garden.

visits.description: A map of visitor identifier to visit count

completed.description: A map of visitor identifier to completed count

resources_collected.description: A map of resource ID to amount collected

owner.description: The UUID of the owner of this house.

name.description: The name of this house, may contain Minecraft color symbols.

createdAt.description: The time this house was created.

players.description: The number of players in this house.

current.description: The current amount of cookies that this house has for the current week.

get.summary: Data of a specific player, including game stats
The recently played games of a specific player
The current online status of a specific player
Retrieve a Guild by a player, id, or name

get.description: Returns information about Hypixel Games. This endpoint is in early development and we are working to add more information when possible HypixelDev/PublicAPI#197

games.description: A map where the key is the backend name of the game

get.description: Information regarding Collections in the SkyBlock game.
Information regarding skills in the SkyBlock game.
Information regarding items in the SkyBlock game.
Information regarding the current mayor and ongoing election in SkyBlock.

current.description: Data regarding the current election, will not be provided if there is no open election ongoing

get.description: Information regarding the current bingo event and its goals.

lastUpdated.description: The unix milliseconds timestamp of the last time this data was updated

id.description: The current bingo event ID, increments by 1 for each bingo hosted

name.description: The display name for the current bingo event

start.description: The start time of the current bingo event in unix milliseconds

end.description: The end time of the current bingo event in unix milliseconds

modifier.description: The modifier for the current bingo event

goals.description: The goals for the current bingo event, as well as their progress

id.description: The backend ID for this goal

name.description: The user friendly display name for this goal

fullLore.description: The full description of this goal

tiers.description: The tiers of this goal, if a global goal

progress.description: The global progress of this goal

requiredAmount.description: The required amount for this specific goal

get.summary: Request auction(s) by the auction UUID, player UUID, or profile UUID.
get.description: Returns the auctions selected by the provided query. Only one query parameter can be used in a single request, and cannot be filtered by multiple.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The auction UUID that you wish to request

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player UUID that you wish to request

parameters.name: profile
parameters.description: The profile UUID that you wish to request

get.description: Returns the currently active auctions sorted by last updated first and paginated.
SkyBlock auctions which ended in the last 60 seconds.

Returns the list of products along with their sell summary, buy summary and quick status.
 ### Product Description
 The returned product info has 3 main fields:
 - `buy_summary`
 - `sell_summary`
 - `quick_status`

`buy_summary` and `sell_summary` are the current top 30 orders for each transaction type (in-game example: [Stock of Stonks](https://i.imgur.com/SjRONxq.png)).

`quick_status` is a computed summary of the live state of the product (used for advanced mode view in the bazaar):
- `sellVolume` and `buyVolume` are the sum of item amounts in all orders.
 - `sellPrice` and `buyPrice` are the weighted average of the top 2% of orders by volume.
 - `movingWeek` is the historic transacted volume from last 7d + live state.
 - `sellOrders` and `buyOrders` are the count of active orders.
SkyBlock profile data, such as stats, objectives etc. The data returned can differ depending on the players in-game API settings.
SkyBlock museum data for all members of the provided profile. The data returned can differ depending on the players in-game API settings.
SkyBlock garden data for the provided profile.
Bingo data for participated events of the provided player.

404.description: No data could be found for the provided player uuid.

cause.example: No bingo data could be found

get.description: Retrieve the currently active or upcoming Fire Sales for SkyBlock.
This data may be cached for a short period of time.
This data may be cached for a short period of time.

parameters.name: house
parameters.description: The UUID of the house to get information about.

get.summary: The public houses for a specific player.
get.description: This data may be cached for a short period of time.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The UUID of the player to get houses for.
